Articles.Content:
![IGJF9Jr.png](http://i.imgur.com/IGJF9Jr.png)

I was completing a mission to flyby the Mun and when I timewarped to get back to Kerbin, this is what it looked like.

I'm not too sure what else to say about it. Nothing in the debug menu says anything unusual.

It's not gameplay-harming in any way, it just looks weird, I thought I would report it here so Squad can fix it with the next patch.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T20:54:40Z" title="04/27/2015 08:54  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by yorshee**
Looks like Kerbin didn't have a chance to load the better LoD for close up, can you try a quicksave (F5) and a quickload (hold F9) ?

> 
> Looks like Kerbin didn't have a chance to load the better LoD for close up, can you try a quicksave (F5) and a quickload (hold F9) ?

Yup, a quickload solved it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Thanks!
